header.rec_loc: Campervan journey from Rzeszow to Tarnow, Poland.
header.topics: Glasses vs. contacts, travel & directions, partying, beauty, the bellend church, weather & asthma, TV & films, gender & equality, work ethic, driving & road furniture, cooking.
header.activity: Two friends talking about various topics (see 9 above) while driving in a campervan from Tarnow to Rzeszow, Poland.

speaker.occupation: unemployed/ Some part-time private TEFL teacher/ Semi-retired
Teacher of English as a foreign Language
